page.title: 14Churches in Slyne-with-Hest
page.content: There are three Churches in Slyne-with- Hest,St Luke's Church of England;the United Reformed Church and the Christadelelphian Church.The Roman Catholic Church is held in the Memorial Hall.The vicar from St Luke's is Mr Maxwell Lucas.The minister from the United Reformed Church is Mr Collison. The other two Churches are taken by different people each week.St Luke's Church has a choir and organist. The United Reformed have an organist but no choir. The Catholic Church members sing to a piano, so do the Christadelelphian congregation.Jumble sales are often held at the Churches to raise funds. There is a Women's Institute, a Mens Institute,Mothers Union and many other clubs held at the Churches.There is a childrens church at 10.30.St Lukes is an unusual Church because it has no stained glass.
